p: The rate of isolation of patients is one of the major factors in suppressing the epidemic ( Figure 4a,b). It was estimated that if patients become symptomatic or HCWs are removed from the system before 3.7 days after infection would have greatly influenced the size of the outbreak in the summer 2015 epidemic. The basic reproduction number also had a significant negative association with the rate of isolation during the epidemic ( Figure 4c,d).
